import{collectMotionValues}from'motion-dom';import{useCombineMotionValues}from'./use-combine-values.mjs';function useComputed(compute){/**
     * Open session of collectMotionValues. Any MotionValue that calls get()
     * will be saved into this array.
     */collectMotionValues.current=[];compute();const value=useCombineMotionValues(collectMotionValues.current,compute);/**
     * Synchronously close session of collectMotionValues.
     */collectMotionValues.current=undefined;return value;}export{useComputed};
